title:
Dispersive blow-up for solutions to three dimensional generalized
  Zakharov-Kuznetsov equations
abstract:
We illustrate the dispersive blow up phenomena of the solutions of three
dimensional generalized Zakharov-Kuznetsov equations. In particular, we
construct smooth initial data such that, the associated global solutions fail
to be $C^{1}$ at time $t$ in a null set containing all rational numbers, but
are $C^{1}$ at all times $t$ which are generic irrational numbers. The key
ingredient are to construct linear solutions which exhibit such phenomena and
to prove nonlinear smoothing estimates for the full nonlinear model.
